outline:
1. plan, device, wickedness, evil plan, mischievous purpose
    1. plan, purpose
    2. evil device, wickedness
    3. not chaste, incest, licentiousness, adultery, idolatry, harlotry
kjv_def: heinous crime, lewd(-ly, -ness), mischief, purpose, thought, wicked (device, mind, -ness).
strongs_def: a plan, especially a bad one
